job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description:
DURATION: 6 month contract to hire

CLEARANCE: Can start with nothing, must be able to obtain interim and then secret clearance

LOCATION: currently 100% remote and then will be going to a hybrid schedule (Scott AF Base 62220)

JOB DESCRIPTION:

*React or Java is biggest requirement - junior level role**

As an agile software engineer, you’ll join a 7-person agile/scrum team (software developers, product owner, and scrum master) to build, customize and integrate new software apps supporting the US Air Force and its air cargo-air refueling-aeromedical evacuation enterprise. Our software facilitates the delivery of lifesaving cargo during humanitarian crises, saving the lives of critically ill Americans, and moving US forces to defend against global threats. You’ll work in a maturing DevSecOps environment, with both cloud and on-prem infrastructure, including the latest technologies in CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, cybersecurity, frequent deployments, and more. The job will also include updating existing systems and integrating improvements to work on the user interfaces already in operation. Mostly new development- would offer a lot of room for advancement and training in house!


Job Responsibilities:

 

· Work with team members to design/sustain innovative software that improves and simplifies planning and executing Air Force global air transportation and aerial refueling missions

 

· Design, develop, document, test and debug application software, using the newest technologies, with good freedom to create and experiment

 

· Perform intensive testing of all new and existing programs to ensure they are free of errors and function as intended

 

· Keep up to date on the newest technological innovations in the field and be ready to apply relevant innovations to our software systems

 

· Any experience in one or more core programming languages (Java, Angular, React, JavaScript)

 

· Any experience using a modern JavaScript framework and libraries such React, Angular, D3, Vue
